title: Excellent Rectangular Block Of 45.5 Perches 250 Meters Away From Main Kotte Rd.- 2.5 Mn. Per Perch
details:
The Property is Situated in a Prime Location in Rampart Rd, Kotte. Capital City Of Srilanka , Sri Jayawardanapura. Just 250 Meters Away From Kotte Main Rd. Also 1 Km. Away From Parliament Rd.

Ideal place more suitable for apartments as it is a clear cut spacious rectangular block of land. No hazel to the nearest public places Bank/Church/temple schools etc it is located in the heart of Sri Jayawardanapura Kotte.
Being its Close Proximity to the Main Roads & Wide Tarred 20 Ft. Roads Enhances the Value Of this Rectangular & High Elevated Property. All Luxury Facilities Shopping, Banking, Entertainment & Fine Dinning Restaurants Are Just Minutes Away.

Only really interested parties may contact for inspection of land.

Price Quoted above is as indicated by the Owner.
NB: Genuine buyers are encouraged & invited to make reasonable offers after inspection of the Property irrespective of the Price Quoted. Since the Sale will take place at the Best Offer Received.
